/post/new/:userId: POST method, creates new post, needs userId
/post/by/:userId: GET method, get posts by a user, needs userId
/post/:postId: PUT/DELETE method, updates/deletes post, needs postId
/post/like: PUT method, adds a like to a certain post
/post/unlike: PUT method, removes a like from a certain post
/user/:userId: GET/PUT/DELETE method, gets/updates/deletes user, needs userId
